btc_regulation.html.title: BTC 的内在价值/The Intrinsic Value of Bitcoin
btc_regulation.html.summary: Bitcoin acts as digital gold. In an era of monetary expansion, it may experience a gold-like price surge, peaking in Q3 2025 and bottoming around 2028.

value_lessons.html.title: 价值投资的四条核心心法/Four Core Principles of Value Investing
value_lessons.html.summary: From Buffett and Munger to Templeton, history shows that mastering value investing requires overcoming human nature.

staff_engineer.html.title: [Career Talk] Challenges and Strategies of Being a Staff Engineer
staff_engineer.html.summary: Influence, strategic technical vision, and trust-building are key challenges on the path to becoming a successful Staff Engineer.

phd_possibilities.html.title: The Infinite Possibilities of a PhD: More Than Academia
phd_possibilities.html.summary: From industry to medical AI, from quant finance to policy strategy, a PhD opens doors far beyond traditional academic paths.

btc_repeat_4years.html.title: 为什么比特币四年一轮回，但你依然赚不到钱？
btc_repeat_4years.html.summary: 从情绪波动、盲目追星到系统性压迫，剖析为什么多数人在比特币周期中仍旧难以盈利。

buffett_munger_weekend_reflection.html.title: 每周往返的高速路上，我听巴菲特和芒格
buffett_munger_weekend_reflection.html.summary: 在Buffalo到多伦多的孤独旅途中，我靠巴菲特与芒格的演讲保持精神秩序，也思考着如何守住博士毕业后的那份独处与清醒。
